tasks.title: Definitive Rebuild Initiative
tasks.description: Complete pixel-perfect rebuild of Mission Control Dashboard with Node.js/Express backend and responsive frontend.

tasks.title: Vercel Production Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy Mission Control to Vercel production environment with proper routing configuration.

tasks.title: SERP Search API Integration
tasks.description: Created serp-search skill for web intelligence gathering. Token configured, script tested successfully.

tasks.title: Multi-Page Navigation System
tasks.description: Built linked pages: Dashboard, Tactical Map, Neural Links, and Archive with consistent styling.

tasks.title: Backend API Development
tasks.description: Express.js API with /api/tasks endpoint. Local verification passed with curl test.

tasks.title: Conceptual Drift Analysis
tasks.description: Reviewed Phase 1-5 failures: scope creep, elastic requirements. Lesson: Requirements are sacred.

tasks.title: Backend Architecture Review
tasks.description: Analyzed Phase 6-10 failures: Vercel serverless misunderstanding, brittle state management.

tasks.title: UI Fidelity Assessment
tasks.description: Reviewed Phase 11-15 failures: 'Close enough' UI, responsiveness afterthought. Lesson: Pixel-perfect is non-negotiable.

tasks.title: Verification Protocol Established
tasks.description: Learned from Phase 16-20: superficial testing. Implemented rigorous local verification with curl.

tasks.title: Deployment Stability Analysis
tasks.description: Reviewed Phase 21-25: fragile Vercel deploys, missing git commits. Lesson: Atomic, descriptive commits.

tasks.title: Debugging Strategy Review
tasks.description: Analyzed cascading failures from Phase 26-33. Lesson: Build robustly, test thoroughly, refactor ruthlessly.

tasks.title: GitHub Repository Sync
tasks.description: Commit final verified code to GitHub repository with descriptive commit messages.

tasks.title: Daily Reporter Automation
tasks.description: Created daily_reporter skill with cron job at 4:00 AM for automated intelligence briefings.

tasks.title: Nexos Provider Configuration
tasks.description: Configured nexos provider with API key. Established model escalation strategy in USER.md.

tasks.title: Auto-move completed In-Progress tasks to Success
tasks.description: If any task in In Progress reaches 100% completion, automatically move it to the Success column (and persist to backend).

tasks.title: Nexos Provider Configuration (Recheck)
tasks.description: Configured nexos provider with API key. Established model escalation strategy in USER.md. Re-queued for verification.

tasks.title: Mobile Responsive Improvements
tasks.description: Make all pages mobile friendly: (1) each task column scrolls, (2) add Modules dropdown button for navigation on small screens.
